5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: Aws bin Aws Ath-Thaqafi said:“I heard the Prophet (ﷺ) say: ‘Whoever takes a bath on Friday, and bathes completely, and goes early, arriving early,* and walks and does not ride (to the mosque), and sits close to the Imam and listens to him, and does not engage in idle talk; for every step he takes he will have the reward of one year, the reward of a year’s fasting and praying (at night).”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْغُسْلِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning bath on Friday
